## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fb7c439ba2209388ade9aba27b75e50772bef4afa861aaaf5b7abf6b447a1620)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'typespec-http-dispatcher' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
